UniprotID	Q9HBV2
Accession	Q9HBV2
EntryName	SACA1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Sperm acrosome membrane-associated protein 1 (Sperm acrosomal membrane-associated protein 32)
GeneName	SPACA1 SAMP32
Length	294
Function	Plays a role in acrosome formation and establishment of normal sperm morphology during spermatogenesis (PubMed:34172998). Important for male fertility (PubMed:11870081).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Acrosome inner membrane
